projectGridLines.title: Telepresence Robot Assistant for Office Navigation and Customer Support
projectGridLines.description:
assist customers in a closed office environment. The robot will navigate users to their desired

locations, provide real-time interaction and support, and have the capability to carry goods, enhancing

overall customer experience and operational efficiency.

Skill sets:

? Programming languages: Python, C, C++, ROS, Java Script, Shell Scripting

? Linux OS

? Machine Learning

? Embedded Hardware Design

? Firmware development

? Knowledge of sensors and actuators

? Hardware and Software debugging skills

? 3D CAD drawing

Traits expectation: 

? Machine Learning and AI

? Embedded Technology

? Web App development

? Sensor/Actuator Interfacing and Wireless Communication

? Mechanical Design and Assembly

Expected learning:

? Robotics Design and Control

? Developing and porting custom robotic application on SBC

? Computer vision techniques

? Wireless Communication

? Sensor Integration

? AI and ML algorithm development for path planning and image analytics

? Mechanical Design

? Systems Integration

? Testing and Debugging

? Collaboration and Communication

? Critical Thinking and Problem-Solving

Specific courses required for project execution:

? Programming languages: Python/C/C++

? Introduction to ROS / ROS2


? Introduction to AI/ML

? Introduction to Sensors and Actuators

Team Composition: 1 Full Stack Developer (any language/framework), 1 Electronics, 1 Robotics
